comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Her wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sybil_Thomas,_Viscountess_Rhondda His full name was David Alfred Thomas; she was born Sybil Margaret Haig. Their daughter: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Haig_Thomas

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: 'In May 1915 he [David Alfred Thomas] was on the RMS Lusitania when she was torpedoed. He and his daughter, Margaret were among the survivors. A humorous story, related by D. A. Thomas, was that local newspaper placards carrying news of the sinking read "Great National Disaster. D. A. Saved".' From en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Alfred_Thomas

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for your research.  We'll fill in the names the next time we update the record.
